snippet.title: The Tribe Game - Out Now!
snippet.description:
https://www.tribeworld.com/game/

We're excited to announce the exclusive release to Tribeworld of the game, which is now available. The English version for our Tribal brothers and sisters who pre-ordered is rolling out over the next 24 hours and will be followed by the German version over the ensuing days. Other language versions, such as Spanish will be available later in the year.

The game will go on general release on outlets such as Steam towards the end of March/beginning of April and we are grateful to have the opportunity to provide this exclusive availability beforehand.
Depending if a gamer gets involved with all the professions and quests, the estimated running time is between 12-14+ hours.

More soon. #KTDA

Visit us on Tribeworld, the official Tribe website: http://www.tribeworld.com 

🎬 Watch The Tribe 🎬
 All 5 seasons of The Tribe have been lovingly remastered for the digital era, and can now be watched in HD via Amazon and Vimeo! 

The Tribe Series on Amazon: https://amzn.to/2Z4kcJB
The Tribe Series on Vimeo: https://vimeo.com/cloud9screenent

🎮The Tribe Game🕹

The Tribe Game is now ready to be played! A rich story-based RPG for Tribe fans and gamers alike. Come and experience a retelling of the first season of The Tribe with many twists and turns, and a beautifully crafted world. Available from our Tribeworld store, and other places.

Check it out via this link; http://www.tribeworld.com/game/

🎧 The Tribe Audiobooks 📖 

The Tribe Audiobooks are now available! Read by multiple members of the original Tribe cast, and brought to life with amazing sound effects and original Tribe music, these audio book dramatizations are not to be missed! 

Check them out via these links, available to purchase or stream: 
Direct Download on Tribeworld: https://www.tribeworld.com/audiobooks/
Amazon Audible: https://tinyurl.com/thetribeaudible 
Vimeo: http://tinyurl.com/c9tribebooksvimeo 

😀 The Tribe on Social Media! 👍 
Join us and other Tribal Brothers and Sisters from around the world via our Social Media pages! 

The Tribe's Official Facebook Page: https://facebook.com/thetribeofficial 
The Tribe's Official Twitter Page: https://twitter.com/thetribeseries 
The Tribe's Official Instagram Profile: https://www.instagram.com/thetribetvseries/ 
The Tribe Official Forum / Bulletin Board: http://thetribeforum.com/ 
Cloud 9’s Twitter Page: https://twitter.com/Cloud9_NZ 

📖 The Tribe Books 📖
Multiple Tribe Books & Novels are now available! Ranging from canonical sequels (The Tribe Series 6 & beyond), behind the scenes, adaptions and much more! 

Check them out via these links, available both Digitally and Physically:
iBooks: http://bit.ly/thetribebooksiTunes 
Amazon Kindle: http://bit.ly/thetribebooksAMZ 
Google Play: http://bit.ly/thetribebooks
GP Physical Books: http://www.tribeworld.com/books/

🎵 The Tribe Music 🎵
Music has always played a large part in the Tribe, and now you can finally listen to songs from all five series of The Tribe on the Tribe Soundtracks Vol 1 & Vol 2!

Check them out via these links, available to purchase or stream: iTunes / Apple Music: http://bit.ly/thetribemusiciTunes
Spotify: https://spoti.fi/2QKEvoc
YouTube Music: http://tinyurl.com/c9tribemusic
Amazon Music: http://bit.ly/thetribemusicAMZ 
⭐ Thank you for watching! Keep the Dream Alive...⭐

© 1999-2022 Cloud 9 (The Tribe) Ltd. All rights reserved.

#TheTribe
